009package Ch15_Color_Filters;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.filter.nonlinear.VectorMedianFilter;
016import imagingbook.common.filter.nonlinear.VectorMedianFilter.Parameters;
017import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
018import imagingbook.common.math.VectorNorm.NormType;
019import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
020
021import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
022
023/**
024 * <p>
025 * This plugin applies a vector median filter to a RGB color image. See Sec. 15.2.2 of [1] for details.
026 * </p>
027 * <p>
028 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
029 * (2022).
030 * </p>
031 *
032 * @author WB
033 * @version 2022/12/10
034 */
035public class MedianFilter_Vector implements PlugInFilter {
036
037        private static final Parameters params = new VectorMedianFilter.Parameters();
038        static {
039                params.radius = 3;
040                params.distanceNorm = NormType.L1;
041        }
042
043        private ImagePlus im;
044
045        /**
046         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
047         */
048        public MedianFilter_Vector() {
049                if (noCurrentImage()) {
050                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.ColorTest3);
051                }
052        }
053
054    @Override
055        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
056                this.im = im;
057         return DOES_RGB;
058    }
059
060    @Override
061        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
062        if (!runDialog())
063                        return;
064
065        VectorMedianFilter filter = new VectorMedianFilter(params);
066        filter.applyTo(ip);
067    }
068    
069    private boolean runDialog() {
070                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
071                gd.addNumericField("Filter radius", params.radius, 1);
072                gd.addEnumChoice("Distance norm", params.distanceNorm);
073//              gd.addCheckbox("Mark modified pixels", params.markModifiedPixels);
074//              gd.addCheckbox("Show mask", params.showMask);
075                
076                gd.showDialog();
077                if(gd.wasCanceled()) return false;
078                
079                params.radius = Math.max(gd.getNextNumber(),0.5);
080                params.distanceNorm = gd.getNextEnumChoice(NormType.class);
081//              params.markModifiedPixels = gd.getNextBoolean();
082//              params.showMask = gd.getNextBoolean();
083                return true;
084    }
085}
086
